item.title: Govt hopeful of recovering part of laundered funds by February: Salehuddin
item.description: Finance Adviser Dr Salehuddin Ahmed on Monday said the process of bringing back laundered money is advancing gradually through legal and institutional mechanisms, though it requires time and cannot be done overnight. “Bringing the money back is not like calling up a Swiss bank and asking the

item.title: Typhoon Bualoi death toll rises to 19 in Vietnam as Hanoi streets flooded
item.description: Vietnam's death toll from Typhoon Bualoi rose to 19 with another 21 people still missing, the government said on Tuesday, making it the most devastating storm to hit the country this year as heavy rains caused severe flooding in Hanoi and across northern provinces. Bualoi made landfall on Monday i

item.title: Mother, daughter found dead in Thakurgaon
item.description: Police recovered the decomposed body of a 45-year-old woman and her daughter from their house at Madarganj in Sadar upazila of Thakurgaon district on Monday night. The deceased were identified as Samila Rani, wife of Jagadish Chandra Roy and her daughter Shapla Rani, 18, of the village, reports UN

item.title: EBL to facilitate the digital holding tax collection of CCC
item.description: Eastern Bank PLC( EBL) will serve as the sole banking partner to implement and operate the digitized holding tax collection system of the Chattogram City Corporation. Dr. Shahadat Hossain, Mayor of Chattogram City Corporation, and Ahmed Shaheen, Additional Managing Director of EBL, signed an MoU

item.title: A car bombing outside a Pakistani security force headquarters kills at least 8 people
item.description: Militants set off a powerful car bomb outside the headquarters of Pakistan’s paramilitary security forces in the southwestern city of Quetta on Tuesday, killing at least eight people and wounding several others, authorities said. Before detonating their vehicle, four attackers who were insid

item.title: Ex-DCCI President calls for separate banking commission to ensure good governance
item.description: Former Dhaka Chamber president Rizwan Rahman has called for a separate accountability mechanism in the banking sector to ensure good governance, suggesting the formation of a National Accountability Commission with representation from both citizens and businesses. Speaking at PRI’s monthly M

item.title: Highest level of security ensured for Durga Puja celebration in Bangladesh: IGP
item.description: Inspector General of Police (IGP) Baharul Alam on Tuesday said the highest level of security has been ensured across the country to ensure peaceful celebration of Durga Puja, the largest religious festival of the Hindu community. A total of 31,606 mandaps have been set up nationwide and except for

item.title: Dengue claims three more lives in 24 hours
item.description: Three more deaths were reported from dengue in 24 hours till Tuesday morning, raising the number of fatalities from the mosquito-borne disease in Bangladesh to 198 this year.
